function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increased overrepresentation of immigrants among inpatients during the second wave of the pandemic","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher likelihood of immigrants to contract the covid-19 disease due to specific vulnerabilities.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High exposure to global trade and gvc-integration leading to vulnerability to contagious diseases propagation.","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contagious diseases propagation within interconnected supply chains.","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Simplified procedures for essential activities may lead to insufficient health and safety measures, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Competition and diversification in gvcs may lead to increased movement of people and goods, potentially accelerating the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shortage of facemasks","category":"Lack of access control.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of research and data on improving building health impacts and public awareness preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Malaria-causing mosquitoes access buildings through inlets and outlets, designed for air exchange","category":"Poor vector-borne diseases
